authors.name: Martin Fowler
authors.biography: He is a software developer, author and international speaker on software development, specializing in object-oriented analysis and design, UML, patterns, and agile software development methodologies.

authors.name: Robert C. Martin
authors.biography: He is an American software engineer and author. He is a co-author of the Agile Manifesto. He now runs a consulting firm called Object Mentor.

authors.name: Andrew Hunt
authors.biography: He is an American software developer best known as one of the authors of The Pragmatic Programmer. He and David Thomas are co-authors of the book The Pragmatic Programmer.

authors.name: David Thomas
authors.biography: He is an American software developer best known as one of the authors of The Pragmatic Programmer. He and Andrew Hunt are co-authors of the book The Pragmatic Programmer.

authors.name: Kent Beck
authors.biography: He is an American software engineer and the creator of extreme programming, a software development methodology that eschews rigid formal specification for a collaborative and iterative design process.

authors.name: Eric Evans
authors.biography: He is an American software developer and author, known for his work on domain-driven design (DDD).

authors.name: Joshua Bloch
authors.biography: He is a software engineer and a technology author, formerly employed at Sun Microsystems and Google. He led the design and implementation of numerous Java platform features, including the Java Collections Framework and the java.math package.

authors.name: Steve McConnell
authors.biography: He is an American software engineer, author and consultant, best known for being the author of Code Complete, a software development book.

authors.name: Uncle Bob
authors.biography: He is an American software engineer and instructor. He is best known for being one of the authors of the Agile Manifesto and for developing several software design principles.

authors.name: Sandi Metz
authors.biography: She is an American software developer, author, and international speaker. She is best known for her book Practical Object-Oriented Design in Ruby.
